detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a shaft that finishes at the knee.

Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a low waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and fly with a visible zip. Fake pockets with decorative zips at the front and quilted details on the knees.

Dog duffle coat in a felted weave with a foldover collar and hole for a leash at the back of the neck. Decorative wind flap and buttons, and decorative flap pockets at the top, and two hook and loop fasteners underneath. Narrow elastic straps for the back legs to help keep the coat in place. Lined.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
Sleeveless, A-line jersey dress with slightly deeper armholes, pockets in the side seams and a double layer at the top.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Wide skirt in a lightweight, patterned cotton weave with covered elastication at the waist and gathers at the top. Lined in a cotton weave.
Hard plastic smartphone case covered in leather on one side. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.
Relaxed-fit jumper in a cotton knit with hard-worn details. V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Set in woven fabric with a shirt, suit waistcoat and bow tie. Long-sleeved shirt with an easy-iron finish, turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable bow tie with a plastic fastener. Waistcoat with buttons down the front, fake welt front pockets and a back made from woven fabric with a sheen. Faux handkerchief in the chest pocket. Lined.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch wool weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Padded gilet in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Dungarees in soft, stretch denim with a pocket at the top, press-studs at the sides and elasticated straps with adjustable fastening at the front. Concealed press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y). Seam with belt loops at the waist, a fake fly and fake front and back pockets.

Sleeveless top in a lightweight cotton weave with elastication across the back and narrow shoulder straps with a broderie anglaise flounce and overlocked scalloped edge. Decorative bow where the shoulder straps join at the back.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and a heel strap with covered elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 1 cm.
Vest tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Tights in a soft, fine, rib-knit wool blend with soft elastication at the waist.
Court shoes with pointed toes and block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.

Faux shearling-lined jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, front pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined in recycled polyester.
Lace thong briefs with an elastic-trimmed mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, large metal press-studs at the top, a racer back and high-cut legs.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 68x180 cm.
Hoop earrings with pendants decorated with pearly plastic beads. Length 6.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with scalloped trims around the armholes and front of the neckline. Lined.
Long vest top in soft cotton jersey with deep armholes, a seam centre back, slits in the sides and a rounded hem at the front. Straight-cut and slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with darts and a concealed zip at the top and a deep neckline with a small frill trim in a contrasting colour. Seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Seersucker apron with wide ties and decorative satin ribbon trims at the hem. Lining in a recycled polyester and cotton blend.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Short dress in a patterned Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend with glittery threads. Deep V-neck with a knot detail under the bust, an opening at the front and a zip in one side. Short, gathered sleeves with concealed elastication and a fitted skirt with gathers to create a draped effect at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Double-layered hats in stretch cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
5-pocket shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist with decorative ties, a fake fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Pull-on trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Body in mesh and lace with a super push-up bra. Underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.

Pyjamas in soft, gently draping satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, decorative covered buttons at the front and a drawstring at the waist. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, mirrored lenses.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Pyjama bottoms in cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and tapered legs.
Round-necked top in cool jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wrapover front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, buttons on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Short A-line skirt.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Sleeveless sports top in jersey with a mesh-lined hood with a drawstring and collar, and a rounded hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned cotton denim with a narrow turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a rounded hem and short slits in the sides. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Blouse in a linen weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey, one patterned.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.

Hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, asymmetric seam under the bust and buttons down the front. Smocking at the back of the hem and at the cuffs. Unlined.
Treggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Narrow belt in imitation suede with a ball chain trim around the edges and a metal buckle. Width 2 cm.
A-line dress in patterned lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and a detachable braided imitation suede belt.
Short ribbed top in soft viscose-blend jersey with short sleeves and a cut-out front section at the top.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Fully lined bikini top with an elasticated hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, fitted dress in jersey containing glittery threads with a foil print. Round neckline, an open section with wrapover sides at the back, and long sleeves. Unlined.
